inputpanels

Class TermekInputPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • inputpanels.TermekInputPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputPanel, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TermekInputPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements InputPanel
    Provides gui for input data to the database product purchases. It also has a price list to get the available products. It reads them from a .txt file and stores them in a HashMap.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TermekInputPanel

        public TermekInputPanel(java.util.List<Termek> arlista)
        Instantiates a new termek input panel. Also, it adds a listener to the JCombobox, to make the fizetett change the default price every time the termekComboBox value has changed.
        Parameters:
        arlista - the arlista
